Description: Welcome to 36 Clarence Street!! Nicely renovated 2 bedroom unit on the first floor of a multi-family home located in Everett. Unit features a beautiful living room and dining room along with two good sized bedrooms. This unit boasts a gorgeous new kitchen with top of the line stainless steel appliances, beautiful counter-tops, cabinets and backsplash. Along with central ac. All applicants must provide strong credit references and proof of income. Please call or text Kevin for all showings.
